DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , single-institution observational study conduct 4 clinic within Southern California Permanente Medical Group . Pregnant woman present prenatal genetic counseling designate clinic meet study eligibility criterion offer option verifi® prenatal test train , license certify genetic counselor ( GC ) . Women elect verifi® prenatal test blood sample draw peripheral venipuncture send Verinata Health CAP-accredited clinical laboratory ( Redwood City , CA ) . Results report order health care provider laboratory within 8-10 business day share subject provider . Subject care decision-making follow NIPT result clinically manage provider his/her subject dictate study protocol . All eligible woman provide informed consent , whether elect decline NIPT ask complete short questionnaire view prenatal testing . The uptake invasive prenatal procedure ( CVS and/or amniocentesis ) total prospective cohort collect review electronic medical record ( EMR ) . A historical cohort match demographic pre-test indication prospective cohort identify EMR comparison primary analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Impact Noninvasive Prenatal Testing Fetal Aneuploidy Utilization Prenatal Diagnostic Procedures Pregnant Women 's Views
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age 18 year old enrollment Clinically confirm singleton pregnancy Gestational age 10 week , 0 day 20 week , 0 day Referred prenatal genetic counseling due increase risk fetal aneuploidy ( advanced maternal age ( AMA ≥ 35 year delivery , highrisk prenatal screen result , abnormal fetal ultrasound find consistent fetal aneuploidy , and/or history prior affected pregnancy fetal aneuploidy ) Pregnancy record accessible available data collection ( e.g. , result screen , ultrasound examination , invasive prenatal procedure perform , infant hospital discharge exam ) Able provide consent participation use languageappropriate form Exclusion Criteria Invasive prenatal procedure ( amniocentesis CVS ) already perform History demise vanish cotwin ( spontaneous follow vitro fertilization )
